Security reminderThis studio is for education and experimentation. Do not upload production data or secrets. Outputs are demos; review before using anywhere safety-critical or financial.

Reflection and next steps

This studio is about reasoning, not just building. Write down what you learned so you can defend decisions later.

Reflection prompts

  • What is the single biggest risk if this system ships as designed?
  • Which decision would you want written down as an Architecture Decision Record (ADR), and why?
  • What failure should be graceful, and how will you design for that now?
  • Where will you add logging and metrics first, and what question will they answer?
  • If you had to halve the budget, what would you simplify without harming safety?

Saved locally by your browser. No accounts required for reflection notes.

Exit routes

Software architecture notes Cybersecurity notes AI studios

How this prepares you for real work

  • You can separate requirements from solutions.
  • You can explain boundaries and interfaces with clear reasons.
  • You can design APIs that behave under failure and abuse.
  • You can plan deployments that avoid panic rollbacks.
  • You can talk about trade-offs without pretending there is a perfect answer.
